content: Water collector holder DD-ST-150/160-WCH ### Categories: Home > Products > Dust and water management > Drill stand mounted water collectors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Enables clean drilling overhead Collect up to 100% of slurry Applications Used when coring on walls or overhead to fit a water collector system to a drill stand Water collector systems can be used with the WMS 100 water management system or a vacuum cleaner ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accessory type: Water collector holders Product information: Water collector holder for DD-ST 120, DD-ST 150 and DD-ST 160 drill stands For use with: DD 120, DD 150-U, DD 160 Technical Data | Accessory type | Water collector holders | Product information | Water collector holder for DD-ST 120, DD-ST 150 and DD-ST 160 drill stands | For use with | DD 120, DD 150-U, DD 160 | Additional Accessory Information | Water collector holder for DD-ST 120, DD-ST 150 and DD-ST 160 drill stands ### ITEMS- 2016633 - Water collector holder DD-ST-150/160-WCH - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x Water collector holder assy
